resources.string: Background image of the start page
The Wanderer in Genshin Impact is a courageous and determined protagonist exploring the vibrant realm of Teyvat.
Makima is a compelling character from the manga series "Chainsaw Man." She possesses a mysterious and manipulative nature as the leader of Public Safety Devil Hunters.
Makima from the series Chainsaw Man

This drawing from Twenty One Pilots is a symbolic representation of resilience and overcoming inner struggles. It embodies the band\'s message of facing personal demons and transforming them into sources of strength.
Dragon Icon from Twenty One Pilots
With a determined gaze, she takes hold of the crimson ribbon, a symbol of constraints. As her blade slices through it, she liberates herself, embracing newfound freedom.
A girl cutting a red ribbon

Perched atop the skyscraper\'s pinnacle, their legs dangle fearlessly, defying gravity. Amidst the urban chaos, they find solace in each other\'s presence, their intertwined souls symbolizing an unbreakable bond fueled by boundless love.
Two lovers sitting on the top of a skyscraper
Nature\'s embrace, a lady blooms adorned with vibrant foliage, her heart aglow with azure light, symbolizing deep connection and inner growth.
A young lady covered with leaves and flowers.

Tighnari - A young researcher well-versed in botany who currently serves as a Forest Watcher in Avidya Forest. He is a straight shooter with a warm heart - and a dab hand at guiding even the dullest of pupils.
Ethereal comets intertwine in a mesmerizing artwork, capturing the fleeting beauty and destined encounters of the celestial tapestry.
Two Comets in sky from the anime "Your Name"

Brendon from Panic at the Disco wears a majestic crown, embodying his musical reign. The band\'s logo gleams as a butterfly flutters nearby, symbolizing metamorphosis and the transformative artistry of the band.
Brendon from Panic At The Disco

In a moment of vulnerability, the young girl\'s desperate cry echoes through the closing gate. As darkness engulfs her, a slender beam of light peeks through the slightly ajar door, symbolizing hope\'s delicate persistence amidst confinement.
A girl peeking behind the closing door
Violet Evergarden amidst blossoms, exudes depth and vulnerability. Her enigmatic gaze symbolizes the delicate balance between strength and longing, amidst the ethereal beauty of petals.
MC from the anime Violet Evergarden

In the heart of a lush forest, the protagonist of "Ousama Ranking" lies gently embraced by nature\'s embrace. Through vulnerability and introspection, they find solace and the seeds of resilience, ready to bloom.
MC from the anime Ousama Ranking

Within the cup\'s depths, a miniature world unfolds—a serene pond brimming with life. The lotus blossoms symbolize resilience, reminding us that even within confined spaces, beauty and tranquility can flourish.
A cup which contains a small pond

Gojo from Jujutsu Kaisen wears circular black glasses, his infectious smile illuminated by the warm embrace of sunlight. The contrasting hues reflect his enigmatic charisma and the brilliance he brings to the world.

Twenty One Pilots depicted in this vibrant art piece, contrasting their introspective lyrics with a burst of vivid colors. Their music, like a kaleidoscope, blends diverse emotions into a harmonious symphony.
A whimsical, cartoon-style portrayal of a traditional Japanese home from "Spirited Away," encapsulating the enchanting magic of Studio Ghibli\'s imaginative realm.
A traditional Japanese home from "Spirited Away"
Nobara from Jujutsu Kaisen, wielding lethal precision, merges beauty and danger. Delicate roses adorn her face, epitomizing a captivating blend of fury and grace.
